articles.title: Councils where bin collections are delayed over lorry driver shortages - see full list - The Mirror
articles.description: The nationwide HGV driver shortfall is now affecting several councils too, with some asking the government for special visas to allow European drivers here to staff their bin lorries
articles.content:

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: EU and AstraZeneca reach deal to end vaccine delivery dispute - 9News
articles.description: The European Union and drugmaker AstraZeneca said Friday that they reached a deal to end a damaging legal battle over the slow pace of deliveries of the company's COVID-19 vaccines.
